articles.headline: Beneath Markets’ Calm Are Signs of Growing Investor Caution
articles.snippet: Stocks are modestly lower, while gold, a traditional haven for investors, continues to climb in value.
articles.abstract: Stocks are modestly lower, while gold, a traditional haven for investors, continues to climb in value.
articles.lead_paragraph: President Trump threatened nuclear war with North Korea, and the markets yawned.

articles.headline: Democratic Fight in California Is a Warning for the National Party
articles.snippet: A bitter party leadership fight in the bluest of blue states signals the challenges Democrats face as they debate how to seize back power nationally.
articles.abstract: A bitter party leadership fight in the bluest of blue states signals the challenges Democrats face as they debate how to seize back power nationally.
articles.lead_paragraph: SACRAMENTO — For Democrats across the nation, California has offered a bright if lonely light this year. The party controls every statewide office and commands supermajorities in the Legislature. Gov. Jerry Brown and legislative leaders have become national voices, steering the party as it pushes back against President Trump on issues as varied as the environment and immigration.

articles.headline: With Disney’s Move to Streaming, a New Era Begins
articles.snippet: Plans announced by the world’s largest media company to start two Netflix-style services instantly reverberated through the entertainment industry.
articles.abstract: Plans announced by the world’s largest media company to start two Netflix-style services instantly reverberated through the entertainment industry.
articles.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Disney set off a sonic boom in Hollywood by unveiling plans to start two Netflix-style services: For the first time in the streaming age, the world’s largest media company had decided that embracing a new business model was more important than clinging to its existing one.

articles.headline: Major Rental-Home Companies Set to Merge as U.S. House Prices Recover
articles.snippet: The merger of Invitation Homes and Starwood Waypoint Homes would create one of the biggest institutional owners of single-family rentals, with 82,000 homes.
articles.abstract: The merger of Invitation Homes and Starwood Waypoint Homes would create one of the biggest institutional owners of single-family rentals, with 82,000 homes.
articles.lead_paragraph: After the housing market collapsed more than a decade ago, new investors poured in to buy foreclosed homes and rent them out. Now, a $4.3 billion deal suggests that the bargain-hunting binge in housing is finally over.
